Professional A1-B1 Kurmanji lessons designed by Kurdish educators. Step-by-step progression from alphabet to conversation.

AI evaluates your performance during lessons, identifies weak areas, and generates personalized practice sets adapted to your level.

Every word and sentence with native Kurmanji pronunciation powered by AI text-to-speech. Listen, repeat, improve.
